summary: Vault-specific changes appear to implement the requested motion, square thumbnail rendering, improved full-screen moment viewer, and global button pulsing with opt-out/disabled handling. However, the diff also includes substantial unrelated UI/route/auth changes that were not requested, and it appears to modify an explicitly immutable hook path.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified Internet Identity hook behavior despite being listed as an immutable path in constraints.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids modifying `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`/`.tsx`, but the diff summary indicates it was changed.

hallucinated_features.description: Significant splash screen/onboarding slideshow animation/theming changes (3D animations, premium zoom settle, per-slide button theming, bidirectional navigation).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Vault UX polish requirements (REQ-1..REQ-5).

hallucinated_features.description: Welcome page redesign (purple gradient background, 3D entrance animation, button theming, sign-out removal).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Vault UX polish requirements.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by Vault UX polish requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added GSAP dependency for sign-in overlay animations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces new dependency unrelated to stated Vault UX polish scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed standalone moments feed route / navigation changes beyond Vault polish.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly say not to introduce new navigation tabs or a new feed page; removing/altering existing routes is also not requested as part of this Vault polish.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for "frontend/src/App.tsx": "removed standalone moments feed route")
